metadata.title: CVE-2019-12829 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: radare2 through 3.5.1 mishandles the RParse API, which allows remoteattackers to cause a denial of service (application crash) or possibly haveunspecified other impact, as demonstrated by newstr buffer overflows duringreplace operations. This affects libr/asm/asm.c and libr/parse/parse.c.

criterions.comment: radare2: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
